title: A Salute to Our Heroes: The U.S. Marines (A Marine Corps children's book)
features: Come along with Chesty the bulldog, the mascot of the U.S. Marines, as he takes us on an exciting journey into the world of the United States Marine Corps.
description: Sales of this book help support the Injured Marine - Semper Fi Fund.  Please support our Marines!
